GK16ujjvni_u:4659: jñātaṃ jñātaṃ smita-vimuṣite kāpi vāmāsti yogyā
GK16ujjvni_u:4660: krīḍā-vāde balavati yayā na dvayor eva bhaṅgaḥ // RUnm_15.108 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4662: kuñja-dvāri niviṣṭayos taraṇijā-tīre dvayor eva nau
GK16ujjvni_u:4663: tatrānyonyam apaśyatoḥ sakhi mudhā nirbandhataḥ klāntayoḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4664: haste drāg atha dāḍimī-phalam abhinyaste mayā nistalaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4665: rādhām udbhidura-smitāṃ parihasan phullāṅgam āliṅgiṣam // RUnm_15.109 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4672: hetur yas tu śamaṃ yathāyogyaṃ prakalpitaiḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4676: priya-vākyasya racanaṃ yat tu tat sāma gīyate // RUnm_15.114 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4678: jātaṃ sundari tathaym eva pṛthunā rādhe'parādhena me
GK16ujjvni_u:4679: kintu svārasiko mamātra śaraṇaṃ snehas tvadīyo balī /
GK16ujjvni_u:4680: ity ākarṇya giraṃ harer natamukhī bāṣpāmbhasāṃ dhārayā
GK16ujjvni_u:4689: madhyo'sau bali-bandhano mukha-rucā rāmās tvayā nirjitā
GK16ujjvni_u:4690: labdhā śrī-ghanatādya mānini manasy aṅgīkṛtā kalkitā // RUnm_15.117 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4692: nāyakasya sva-vacasā bhaṅgyāyaṃ bheda īryate // RUnm_15.118 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4694: rūkṣā yan mayi vartase tvam abhitaḥ snigdhe'pi te dūṣaṇaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4695: tatrāste na hi kintu tat kila mamānaucitya-jātaṃ phalam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4696: yena svastaruṇīr upekṣya caramām apy āśrayantīr daśāṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4697: premārtaṃ vraja-yauvataṃ ca sumukhi tvaṃ kevalaṃ sevyase // RUnm_15.119 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4701: ity ālībhir alakṣitaṃ murabhidā bhadrāvalī bheditā
GK16ujjvni_u:4702: nāsāgre vara-mauktika-śriyam adhād asrasya sā bindunā // RUnm_15.120 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4704: vyājena bhūṣaṇādīnāṃ pradānaṃ dānam ucyate // RUnm_15.121 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4706: kāmo nāma suhṛn mamāsti bhavatīm ākarṇya mat-preyasīṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4707: hāras tena tavārpito'yam urasi prāpnotu saṅgotsavam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4708: ity unnamya karaṃ muradviṣi vadaty udbhinna-sāndra-smitā
GK16ujjvni_u:4709: padmā māna-vinigrahāt praṇayinā tenodbhaṭaṃ cumbitā // RUnm_15.122 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4711: kevalaṃ dainyam ālambya pādapāto natir matā // RUnm_15.123 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4719: upekṣā kathyate kaiścit tūṣṇīmbhāvatayā sthitiḥ // RUnm_15.125 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4721: sūnur vallabha eṣa vallavapates tatrāpi vīrāgraṇī-
GK16ujjvni_u:4723: sakhyaḥ samprati rūkṣatā pṛthur iyaṃ tenātra na śreyase
GK16ujjvni_u:4724: dūre paśyata yāti niṣṭhura-manāḥ kā yuktir atrocitā // RUnm_15.126 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4728: pauṣpaṃ rajaḥ patitam atra dṛśor mameti // RUnm_15.127 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4731: prasādanaṃ mṛgākṣīṇām upekṣeti smṛtā budhaiḥ // RUnm_15.128 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4733: dhammille nava-mālatī paricitā savye ca śabda-grahe
GK16ujjvni_u:4734: mallī sundari dakṣiṇe tu katarat puṣpaṃ tava bhrājate /
GK16ujjvni_u:4735: āghreyaṃ paricetum ity upahite vyājena nāsā-puṭe
GK16ujjvni_u:4736: gaṇḍodyat-pulakā vihasya hariṇā candrāvalī cumbitā // RUnm_15.129 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4739: yādṛcchikaṃ buddhi-pūrvam iti dvedhā tad ucyate // RUnm_15.130 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4741: upasthitam akasmād yat tad yādṛcchikam ucyate // RUnm_15.131 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4743: api gurubhir upāyair adya sāmādibhir yā
GK16ujjvni_u:4744: lavam api na mṛgākṣī māna-mudrām abhāṅkṣīt /
GK16ujjvni_u:4745: harim iha parirebhe sā svayaṃgrāham agre
GK16ujjvni_u:4749: sakhīnāṃ cāturye gatavati ca sadyaḥ śithilatām /
GK16ujjvni_u:4753: buddhi-pūrvaṃ tu kāntena pratyutpanna-dhiyā kṛtam // RUnm_15.134 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4755: pāṇau pañcamukhena duṣṭa-kṛmiṇā daṣṭo'smi roṣād iti
GK16ujjvni_u:4756: vyājāt kūṇita-locanaṃ vraja-patau vyābhujya vaktraṃ sthite /
GK16ujjvni_u:4757: sadyaḥ projjhita-roṣa-vṛttir asakṛt kiṃ vṛttam ity ākulā
GK16ujjvni_u:4758: jalpantī smita-bandhur āsyam amunā gāndharvikā cumbitā // RUnm_15.135 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4760: nyastaṃ dāma kṛtāgasādya hariṇā dṛṣṭvā puro rādhayā
GK16ujjvni_u:4761: kṣiptenābhihataḥ sa tena kapaṭī duḥkhīva bhugnānanaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4762: mīlann eva niṣedivān bhuvi tataḥ sadyas tayā vyagrayā
GK16ujjvni_u:4763: pāñibhyāṃ dhṛta-kandharaḥ sthita-mukho bimboṣṭham asyāḥ papau
GK16ujjvni_u:4766: vināpy upāyaṃ māno'sau līyate vraja-subhruvām // RUnm_15.137 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4769: puro vṛndāraṇyaṃ kim api kalayantī kusumitam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4770: hariṃ ca smerāsyaṃ priyaka-taru-mūle priyam itaḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:4771: skhalan-mānā sakhyām adiśata satṛṣṇaṃ dṛśam asau // RUnm_15.138 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4776: smita-rucibhir atānīt tatra rādhā prasādam // RUnm_15.139 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4779: na muñca mama devi nātra nirbandhaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4781: sa bhavatu vijayī harer veṇuḥ // RUnm_15.140 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4783: mānasyopādhyāyi prasīda sakhi rundhi me śruti-dvandvam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4784: ayam uccāṭana-mantraṃ siddho veṇur vane paṭhati // RUnm_15.141 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4785: tāratamyaṃ tu mānasya hetoḥ syāt tāratamyataḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4786: syāl laghur madhyamaś cāsau mahiṣṭhaś cety atas tridhā // RUnm_15.142 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4787: susādhyaḥ syāl laghur māno yatna-sādhyasya madhyamaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4788: duḥsādhyaḥ syād upāyena mahiṣṭhaḥ preyasāpy ayam // RUnm_15.143 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4798: yā viśleṣa-dhiyārtis tat prema-vaicittyam ucyate // RUnm_15.147 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4802: kāntaṃ me sakhi darśayeti daśanair udgūrṇa-śasyāṅkurā
GK16ujjvni_u:4803: rādhā hanta tathā vyaceṣṭate yataḥ kṛṣṇo'py abhūd vismitaḥ // RUnm_15.148 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4805: samajani davād vitrastānāṃ kim ārta-ravo gavāṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4806: mayi kim abhavad vaiguṇyaṃ vā niraṅkuśam īkṣitam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4807: vyaraci nibhṛtaṃ kiṃ vāhūtiḥ kayācid abhīṣṭayā
GK16ujjvni_u:4808: yad iha sahasā mām atyākṣīd vane vanajekṣaṇaḥ // RUnm_15.149 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4809: vilāsam anurāgas tu kutracit kam api vrajam /
GK16ujjvni_u:4810: pārśve santam api preṣṭhaṃ hāritaṃ kurute sphuṭam // RUnm_15.150 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4812: spaṣṭaṃ muktā-phale caitad vopadevena varṇitam // RUnm_15.151 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4816: vyavadhānaṃ tu yat prājñaiḥ sa pravāsa itīryate // RUnm_15.152 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4820: sa dvidhā buddhi-pūrvaḥ syāt tathiavābuddhi-pūrvakaḥ // RUnm_15.154 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4824: kiñcid dūre sudūre ca gamanād apy ayaṃ dvidhā // RUnm_15.156 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4829: cittaṃ mukhe tava nayaty ahar adya rādhā // RUnm_15.157 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4831: bhāvī bhavaṃś ca bhūtaś ca tirvidhaḥ sa tu kīrtyate // RUnm_15.158 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4834: eṣa kṣattā vrajanarapateḥ ājñayā gokule asmin
GK16ujjvni_u:4836: duṣṭam bhūyaḥ sphurati ca balādīkṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ me
GK16ujjvni_u:4837: tena svāntaṃ sphuṭati caṭulam hanta bhāvyaṃ na jāne // RUnm_15.159 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4841: tāvat tūrṇaṃ sphuṭa khura-puṭaiḥ kṣauṇi-pṛṣṭaṃ khananto
GK16ujjvni_u:4842: yāvan nāmī hṛdaya bhavato ghoṭakāḥ sphoṭakā syuḥ // RUnm_15.160 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4844: kāmaṃ dūre sahacari varīvarti yat kaṃsavairī
GK16ujjvni_u:4845: na idam lokottaramapi vipaddurdinaṃ me dunoti /
GK16ujjvni_u:4846: āśākīlo hṛdi kila vṛtaḥ prāṇarodhī tu yo me
GK16ujjvni_u:4849: preṣaṇaṃ kriyate premṇā sandeśasya parasparam // RUnm_15.162 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4853: dvitraireva priyasakhi dinaiḥ sevyatāṃ devi śavye
GK16ujjvni_u:4857: santāpaṃ na harantu nāma nitarāṃ kurvanti kasmāt punaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4867: daivenādya virodhinā katham itas tvaṃ hanta dūrīkṛtā // RUnm_15.166 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4869: pralāpo vyādhir unmādo moho mṛtyur daśā daśa // RUnm_15.167 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4878: yāḥ paśyanti priyaṃ svapne dhanyāstāḥ sakhi yoṣitaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4879: asmākaṃ tu gate kṛṣṇe gatā nidrāpi vairiṇī // RUnm_15.169 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4882: mano me hā kaṣṭaṃ jvalati kimahaṃ hanta karavai
GK16ujjvni_u:4883: na pāraṃ nāvāraṃ kimapi kalayāmy asya jaladheḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4884: iyaṃ vande mūrdhnā sapadi tamupāyaṃ kathaya māṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4901: nidhir mama suhṛttamaḥ kva bata hanta hā dhig-vidhim // RUnm_15.173 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4904: uttāpī puṭa-pākato æpi garala-grāmād api kṣobhaṇo
GK16ujjvni_u:4905: dambholer api duḥsahaḥ kaṭur alaṃ hṛn-magna-śūlyād api
GK16ujjvni_u:4906: tīvraḥ prauḍha-visūcikāni-cayato æpy uccair mamāyaṃ balī
GK16ujjvni_u:4907: marmāṇy adya bhinatti gokula-pater viśleṣa-janmā jvaraḥ // RUnm_15.174 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4911: lutḥati ca bhuvi rādhā kampitāṅgī murāre
GK16ujjvni_u:4917: rādhā mādhava-viprayoga-rabhasād anyeva tīvrād abhūt // RUnm_15.176 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4926: purā baddhā yena praṇayalaharī hanta gahanā /
GK16ujjvni_u:4927: sa cen muktāpekṣastvamapi dhig imāṃ tulaśakalaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4929: pravāsa-vipralambhe'smin daśās tās tā harer api /
GK16ujjvni_u:4935: paryaṅkopari rādhikā-rati-kalāṃ dhyāyan muhuḥ klāmyati // RUnm_15.180 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4937: vividhāḥ syur ihety etā bhūma-bhītyā na kīrtitāḥ // RUnm_15.181 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4939: sādhāraṇyaḥ samastānāṃ prāyaśaḥ sambhavanty api // RUnm_15.182 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4943: sa pravāsa-viśeṣatvān naivātra pṛthag īritaḥ // RUnm_15.184 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4949: hariṇā vraja-devīnāṃ viraho'sti na karhicit // RUnm_15.186 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4956: yūnor ullāsam ārohan bhāvaḥ sambhoga ucyate // RUnm_15.188 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4957: manīṣibhir ayaṃ mukho gauṇaś ceti dvidhoditaḥ // RUnm_15.189 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4959: mukhyo jāgrad-avasthāyāṃ sambhogaḥ sa caturvidhaḥ // RUnm_15.190 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4964: upacārān niṣevete sa saṃkṣipta itīritaḥ // RUnm_15.192 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4978: upacārāḥ sa saṅkīrṇaḥ kiñcit taptekṣu-peśalaḥ // RUnm_15.195 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4987: rādhāyāḥ sakhi sūcayaty aviśadā vāg apy asūyākalāṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4988: mānantaṃ bruvatī tathāpi madhurā kṛṣṇaṃ dhinoty ākṛtiḥ // RUnm_15.197 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4990: pravāsāt saṅgate kānte bhogaḥ sampanna īritaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:4991: dvidhā syād āgatiḥ prādurbhāvaś ceti sa saṅgamaḥ // RUnm_15.198 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5001: āvirbhavaty akasmād yat prādurbhāvaḥ sa ucyate // RUnm_15.201 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5006: ayi svapno dūre viramatu samakṣaṃ śṛṇu haṭhā-
GK16ujjvni_u:5016: upabhogātireko yaḥ kīrtyate sa samṛddhimān // RUnm_15.206 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5018: dagdhaṃ hanta dadhānayā vapur idaṃ yasyāvalokāśayā
GK16ujjvni_u:5019: soḍhā marma-vipāṭane paṭur iyaṃ pīḍātivṛṣṭir mayā /
GK16ujjvni_u:5021: so'yaṃ jīvita-bandhur indu-vadane bhūyaḥ samāliṅgitaḥ // RUnm_15.207 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5023: tavātra parimṛgyatā kim api lakṣma sākṣād iyaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5026: janena patitā puraḥ kanaka-vṛṣṭir āsādyate // RUnm_15.208 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5030: iṣṭāpy atra na hi proktā nātyullāsakarī yataḥ // RUnm_15.209 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5034: sāmānyaḥ sa tu yaḥ pūrvaṃ kathito vyabhicāriṣu /
GK16ujjvni_u:5035: viśeṣaḥ khalu jāgaryā nirviśeṣao mahādbhutaḥ // RUnm_15.211 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5036: bhāvautkaṇṭhye-mayo hy eṣa caturdhā pūrvavan mataḥ // RUnm_15.212 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5041: mama svapne ko'pi priya-sakhi balīyān nava-yuvā // RUnm_15.213 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5043: sakhi kruddhā mā bhūr laghur api na doṣaḥ sumukhi me
GK16ujjvni_u:5044: na mānāgni-jvālām aśamayam ahaṃ tām asamaye /
GK16ujjvni_u:5045: sa dhūrtas te svapne rasa-vṛṣṭiṃ mayi tathā
GK16ujjvni_u:5046: yato vistīrṇāpi svayam iyam ayāsīd upaśamam // RUnm_15.214 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5050: paryātu svacchandaṃ mama samayadharmaḥ kila gatiḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:5051: idaṃ soḍhuṃ kā vā prabhavati yataḥ svapnakapaṭā-
GK16ujjvni_u:5052: dihāyāto vṛndāvanabhuvi kalān māṃ ramayati // RUnm_15.215 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5055: cirād adya svapne mama vividha-yatnād upagate
GK16ujjvni_u:5057: gṛhītvā hā hanta tvaritam atha tasminn api rathaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5058: kathaṃ pratyāsannaḥ sa khalu puruṣo rāja-puruṣaḥ // RUnm_15.216 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5059: tulya-svarūpa evāyaṃ prodyan yūnor dvayor api /
GK16ujjvni_u:5060: ūṣā-niruddhayor yadvat kvacit svapno'py abādhitaḥ // RUnm_15.217 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5062: prāptāni maṇḍanādīni dṛśyante jāgare'pi ca // RUnm_15.218 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5067: ity eṣa hari-bhāvasya vilāsaḥ ko'pi peśala /
GK16ujjvni_u:5068: citra-svapnam ivātanvan kṛṣṇaḥ saṅgamayaty alam // RUnm_15.220 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5070: ye'nubhāva-daśām asyāḥ prāpnuvanti rateḥ sphuṭam // RUnm_15.221 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5071: te tu sandarśanaṃ jalpaḥ sparśanaṃ vartma-rodhanam /
GK16ujjvni_u:5080: kula-sthitir alaṃ tu me manasi tāvad unmīlati /
GK16ujjvni_u:5082: na yāvad aparokṣatām idam apaiti vaktrāmbujam // RUnm_15.225 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5084: jalpaḥ parasparaṃ goṣṭhī vitathoktiś ca kathyate // RUnm_15.226 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5088: yad etā daśanair eṣa daśan nāpnoti maṅgalam // RUnm_15.227 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5092: tvaṃ rādhe śiva-mūrtir ity urasi māṃ bhogīndram aṅgīkuru // RUnm_15.228 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5095: asminn adrau kati na hi mayā hanta hārādi-vittaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5100: na kuru śapatham asya sparśato dūṣitoccair
GK16ujjvni_u:5103: kapaṭini paritas te paśya romāñcitāsti // RUnm_15.230 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5109: tvayā gantuṃ śakyā taraṇi-duhitus tīra-saraṇī // RUnm_15.231 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5113: vadhūś ca taḍid-ujjvalā prati-harid vayaṃ madhyataḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:5119: vilasati tava vaśyā paśya vṛndāṭavīyam // RUnm_15.233 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5122: mālyaṃ bhaṅgam avāpa vīra tilako yātaḥ kilādṛśyatām /
GK16ujjvni_u:5123: vaktrendau pratimā-cchalena śaraṇaṃ labdhaḥ sakhīṃ kaustubhas
GK16ujjvni_u:5124: tan mā bhūś cakito vimukta-cikuraṃ nārdaty asau tvad-vidham // RUnm_15.234 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5133: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva /
GK16ujjvni_u:5135: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si // RUnm_15.236 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5140: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī
GK16ujjvni_u:5143: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya // RUnm_15.238 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5145: chadāvali-vṛtaiva naḥ sapadi kācid ekā vrajaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5147: ayaṃ guṇa-nidhis taror upari tābhir abhyarcyatām
GK16ujjvni_u:5150: ayi jñātaṃ jñātaṃ harasi hariṇākṣi pratidinaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5151: tvam eva pracchannā mama sumanasāṃ mañjarim itaḥ /
GK16ujjvni_u:5152: cirād diṣṭyā cauri tvam iha vidhṛtādya svayam ato
GK16ujjvni_u:5153: guhākārām ārāt praviśa vasatiṃ prauḍhibhir alam // RUnm_15.240 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5158: manye vidhitsatha tad atra gires taṭeṣu
GK16ujjvni_u:5163: kuñje vañjula-śākhinaḥ śaśimukhī līnā varīvarti sā /
GK16ujjvni_u:5164: no ced eṣa tad-aṅghri-saṅgama-vinābhāvād akāle kathaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5170: na tu vadanaṃ muhur arthitāpi tena // RUnm_15.243 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5173: keyaṃ śyāmā sphurati sarale gopakanyā kimarthaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5174: prāptā sakhyaṃ tava mṛgayate nirmitāsau vayasyā /
GK16ujjvni_u:5175: āliṅgāmūṃ muhuriti tathā kurvatī māṃ viditvā
GK16ujjvni_u:5176: nārīveśam hriyamupayayau māninī yatra rādhā // RUnm_15.244 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5184: jitvā dyūta-paṇaṃ daśaty aghahare gaṇḍaṃ mudā dakṣiṇaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5185: sā vāmaṃ ca daśeti tatra rabhasād akṣaṃ kṣipanty abhyadhāt /
GK16ujjvni_u:5186: ājñāṃ sundari te yatheti hariṇā vāme ca daṣṭe tataḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:5187: saṃrambhād iva sā bhujā-latikayā kaṇṭhe babandha priyam // RUnm_15.246 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5191: smitvā smitvā mayi kuca-paṭīṃ kṛṣṭavaty unmadena /
GK16ujjvni_u:5193: niṣṭhīvan yaḥ kiraṇa-laharīṃ hrepayāmāsa rādhām // RUnm_15.247 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5205: na kucāv imau gatijitā tayā hṛtaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:5218: sārdhaṃ rādhikayā harer nidhuvana-krīḍā-vidhir vardhate // RUnm_15.252 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5220: na tathā samprayogeṇa syād evaṃ rasikā viduḥ // RUnm_15.253 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5225: ratād api sukhaṃ harer adhikam ādadhe rādhayā // RUnm_15.254 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5230: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ suratotsavād api navāsvādaṃ vitene sukham // RUnm_15.255 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5235: udbhūtaḥ sa tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ // RUnm_15.256 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5240: ity ādyā vraja-devīnāṃ preyasī praṇayoktayaḥ // RUnm_15.258 //
GK16ujjvni_u:5242: spṛṣṭaḥ paraṃ taṭasthena rasābdhir madhuro mayā //o//
